meta.title: Item - Models - Pricing - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description: Details/configuration for the product to request a price for.

blocks.data: Details/configuration for the product to request a price for.

product_id.description: The (required) product ID of the item

variant_id.description: The (optional) variant ID of the item

options.description: The (optional) option configuration of the product. May be "partially" configured for estimates.

option_id.description: The ID of the variant option or modifier option being configured for this product

value_id.description: The ID of the value matching the option being configured. Note: must be ID, not the value.
